channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 16:13 Air Alarm to Chernihiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 16:13 Air Alarm to Chernihiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Chernihiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
